name: Cosmos Holdings, Inc.
description: Cosmos Holdings, Inc. is a global pharmaceutical company that specializes in the distribution and commercialization of pharmaceutical products. The company was founded in 2015 and operates primarily in the health and wellness sector, focusing on providing high-quality products to meet the needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Cosmos Holdings is committed to enhancing the quality of life through innovative healthcare solutions, including a range of healthcare and wellness products. The company has developed a robust supply chain and distribution network that spans numerous countries, allowing it to efficiently deliver pharmaceutical products to various markets. In addition to its core distribution activities, Cosmos is also engaged in research and development to introduce new products and improve existing ones. With a focus on regulatory compliance and quality assurance, Cosmos Holdings strives to maintain the highest standards in the pharmaceutical industry. The company aims to be a trusted partner in healthcare by providing safe and effective products while also contributing to the advancement of global health.

seo.meta_title: Cosmos Holdings, Inc. | Global Pharmaceutical Distribution
seo.meta_description: Explore Cosmos Holdings, Inc., a leader in pharmaceutical distribution and health products. Discover their commitment to quality and innovation in the pharmaceutical industry.

faq.question: What does Cosmos Holdings specialize in?
faq.answer: Cosmos Holdings specializes in the distribution and commercialization of pharmaceutical products and health and wellness solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cosmos Holdings?
faq.answer: Gregory A. Boulus is the CEO of Cosmos Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Cosmos Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: Cosmos Holdings is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Cosmos Holdings offer?
faq.answer: Cosmos Holdings offers prescription medications, over-the-counter products, nutraceuticals, and dietary supplements.
